message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you.  Given its value, I'm offering it at $20,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $18,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to be somewhat flexible, how about we meet in the middle at $19,000?
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility shown. I would like to propose a price of $17,500 for the product.
